<p><span><a href="/" title="Home">Home</a> » <a href="/international-tours" title="International Tour Packages">International</a> » <span class="breadcrumb_last" aria-current="page">Singapore Malaysia Bali Tour Package</span></span></p>

<div id="cmsmasters_row_673c3376cc7632_07464529" class="cmsmasters_row cmsmasters_color_scheme_default tourflexBox cmsmasters_row_top_default cmsmasters_row_bot_default cmsmasters_row_boxed">

<div class="cmsmasters_row_outer">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_inner">

<div class="cmsmasters_column two_third">
<div class="custom_html tourIB1">
<div class="proGall"><img decoding="async" src="/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/singapore-phuket.jpg" alt="Singapore Malaysia Bali Tour Package" title="Singapore Malaysia Bali Tour Package" width="750" height="450" loading="lazy"></div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB2">
<div class="tour-overview">
<div class="toBt"><i class="fa fa-file"></i> Tour Overview</div>
<p>Want some change this holiday and looking for an international journey then browse our Singapore Malaysia Bali Tour Package and get a beautiful chance to explore the iconic attractions of these three destinations. Singapore, a dream destination of everyone is home to several wonders, and then next comes Malaysia which doesn’t require any introduction and at last you will be visiting Bali, a true paradise for nature lovers and newly-wed couples.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB4">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h2 class="tourDBox"><i class="fa fa-bus" aria-hidden="true"></i> Singapore Malaysia Bali Tour Itinerary Package</h2>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details" id="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 1 :</span>Arrival in Bali</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="">
<p>Our representative will be waiting to welcome you in Bali and after picking you up from the airport he will then take you directly to the Pre-Booked hotel where you relax for the rest of the day. Complete all the required formalities for checking-into the hotel and then come out of your accommodation and indulge yourself in strolling along with the nearby areas and also the nearby markets where you can find some traditional dresses or handicraft items. Once you are done with shopping you will be dropped to the hotel for a night of sound sleep.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 2 :</span>Bali Excursion</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>On the second day of your journey, you are scheduled to explore the wonders and the attractions of Bali which is reckoned as a popular holiday and one of the most preferred honeymoon destinations. Start your day exploration with a visit to the local shopping markets where you can buy some beautiful paintings, artifacts, and designer dresses for all ages. Later in the afternoon serve yourself with a delicious lunch and then drive towards the other destinations in the city which includes a visit to Uluwatu Temple a very popular temple in Bali.</p>
<p>While driving towards Uluwatu Temple you will make a halt at Padang Padang Beach for approx. an hour and then continue driving towards the temple where you witness Kitchen Dance performance organized at the temple side. Once the show is over our representative will join you there at the temple and then transfer you back to the hotel for the scrumptious night meal followed by a relaxing overnight halt.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 3 :</span>Bali Beach</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Today you will be going for a spa treatment in the second half of the day so before this treat yourself with an appetizing morning meal. Once you are done with the massage therapy you will be taken to the popular Benoa Harbour where you will be served with Cruise Dinner along with col drink, and the entire area is adorned with melodious songs. You will also be witnessing the wonderful show performance, people dancing on DJ and enjoy the fragrance and the aroma spread in the surrounding of the beach area.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 4 :</span>Water Sport Activities</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>We have not fixed any particular schedule for the day and you are free to spend your day in leisure. If you are in a mood to buy some more things from the country and to bring them back with you as souvenirs then go for shopping or go for the water sport activities to make your day special and adventurous. Speedboat ride, parasailing, and banana boat ride are some of the activities in which you can indulge yourself.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 5 :</span>Singapore</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Today you will be heading towards the other destination of the journey, Singapore which is like a dream destination of most of the travelers. Do not skip your breakfast in a hurry or excitement and then check-out from the hotel in Bali. You will be dropped at the Bali airport from where you board the flight to reach Singapore and on reaching Singapore Airport you will be transferred to one of your pre-decided hotels after completing all the VISA formalities and other. Inarguably, traveling is not an easy task and you must be tired by now so after considering this we have not designed any schedule for the day.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 6 :</span>Sentosa Sunset</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Post serving you the breakfast our representative will join you and then take you for the sightseeing tour of Singapore city. After exploring some of the wonders of the city in first half of the day you will be transferred back to the hotel for lunch after which you will drive towards the Sentosa Island where you can witness the charm of underwater walk, wings of time and dolphin show which is then followed by enjoying the alluring sunset view. Now, this is the time to return towards the hotel for dinner and overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 7 :</span>Full Day Universal Studio</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>After serving your taste buds with delicious breakfast go for a full-day sightseeing tour of Universal Studio. Today you will not be assisted with our tour representative and you will be exploring the day all alone. You can indulge yourself in various activities like participating as an audience in various shows, going on adventurous rides, and many more. By the time it gets dark we will send our private vehicle to transfer you to the hotel for the scrumptious dinner followed by an overnight halt.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 8 :</span>Singapore – Malaysia</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>After a healthy and lavish breakfast at the Singapore hotel, pack your bags and complete all the check-out formalities and then drive towards the airport to board the flight for Malaysia. You can also opt for the bus services which will be provided to you at a very nominal cost. On reaching Kuala Lumpur, the capital city of Malaysia, complete all the visa formalities and then drive towards the hotel with our representative who will join you at the airport.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 9 :</span>Kuala Lumpur</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Post breakfast, get ready for the half-day sightseeing tour in Kuala Lumpur which boasts several tourist attractions including King Palace, National Mosque, Independent Square, and there are many others. In the evening you will be transferred back to the hotel so that you can relax and gorge upon the delectable night meal.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 10 :</span>Genting Highlands: Batu Caves</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Kick Start your day with a healthy breakfast and then get ready to explore the Genting Highland. En-route this gorgeous highland you will stop at the Batu Caves for a few minutes and then proceed towards the popular Cable Car Point from where you will go to Genting Highlands with a cable car ride. On reaching the destination you will be escorted to the hotel. Visit the indoor theme park where you can participate in various themed shows and performances. This park houses a place which is adorned with artificial snow and if you love to play with the snow then this is going to be the perfect play to make your dream come true. After the completion of this exciting and rejoicing day, you will be dropped to your staying place for having dinner and sound sleep.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 11 :</span>Departure</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>This is the last day of your trip and today you will be boarding the flight for your onward journey towards home. Wake up little late, pack your bags and then go shopping or go to visit some of the nearby places. After returning from the shopping and sightseeing destinations collect your baggage from the hotel and move towards the airport. Your journey with Namaste India Trip concludes here.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="custom_html tourIB8">
<div id="popularBox8" class="tour-collection">
<h3><i class="fa fa-question-circle" aria-hidden="true"></i> FAQs for Singapore Malaysia Bali Package</h3>
<div class="panel-body">
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Weather And The Best Time To Visit?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> While Singapore has a tropical climate all year, Malaysia experiences hot and humid weather all year. Except for the rainy season, which lasts from November to December, any time of year is a good time to visit Singapore.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Are The Similarities Between Singapore And Malaysia?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Malaysia and Singapore have strong historical and cultural ties, as both countries have multiracial populations of Malays, Chinese, and Indians and have been subjected to British colonial rule. This is in addition to cross-border family ties formed as a result of migration between the two countries.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Distinguishes Singapore?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Safe and secure environment - One of the things that Singapore offers that no other Asian country does is a safe and secure environment. The country has a high level of law and order, and the punishments and penalties for even the most minor crimes are severe.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> When Is The Best Time To Visit Bali?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Between May and August, when the weather is most stable, is the best time to visit. November is the hottest month of the year, with an average daily high of 32 degrees Celsius and a low of 25 degrees Celsius. August is the coolest month of the year, with an average daily high of 29 degrees Celsius and a low of 24 degrees Celsius.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Why Do People Travel To Malaysia?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Rich cultural history, beautiful historical landmarks, and enthralling local lifestyle draw tourists from all over the world.</p>
</p></div></div></div></div></div>
</div>
</div>
